      • SaveGame

        public static void SaveGame(LevelBoard levelBoard,
                            java.lang.String fileName,
                            boolean endFile)
        Saves the current game state to a .JSON file
        Parameters:
        levelBoard - the level board to save
        fileName - the name of the file ot save
        endFile - if the end of the file should be written

      • tileAsJSON

                                          java.lang.String itemString,

        Parameters:

        col - the col

      • SaveMove

        public static void SaveMove(java.lang.String fileName,
                            LevelBoard.Direction direction,
                            long time,
                            boolean firstMove)
        Saves a move the player makes. Used when recording.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file
        direction - the direction the player moved
        time - the time the move was made
        firstMove - true if this is the first recorded move
